reviewText: A compact bio of Mikhail that gives us some insight to his rise to power. While there was enough material to make several DVDs this was a light piece but good. Mikhail doesn't add anything new to the Bio and his old classmates say nothing but kind words. But I felt I did learn from watching this.

I never knew why communist fall. I was too young when the iron curtain was finally torn down.
This DVD taught me what for years was a riddle for me.
